> Here's a new topic: if doom was like gladiator, . . 
> 
> If doom was like gladiator, those monsters would
> eventually stop
> attacking you with long range attacks long enough to
> let their mana
> recharge.
> 
> If doom was like gladiator, you couldn't use the
> best weapons until
> you had a bunch of experience points.
> 
> 

If Doom was like Gladiator, it would be called Hexen.
